com.aleozlx.pacswitch

Class PacswitchClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aleozlx.pacswitch.PacswitchClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacswitchAPI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PacswitchMessager

    public abstract class PacswitchClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements PacswitchAPI
    Pacswitch client implementation

    Fork me on github:
    https://github.com/aleozlx/pacscli4java
    And feel free to pay a visit to the server project:
    https://github.com/aleozlx/pacswitch
    Since:
    June 3, 2014
    Version:
    1.3.1
    Author:
    Alex

      • getSocket

        public java.net.Socket getSocket()
        Description copied from interface: PacswitchAPI
        The socket from which I/O streams can be fetched, also is necessary for protocol implementation. This is not actually part of pacswitch API standard
        Specified by:

        The socket from which I/O streams can be fetched
